name: Café Bloqué
description:
Made for the 159th Weekly Game Jam. The game blends tetris-inspired puzzle gameplay with cafe management and turns the classic formula on it's head. Instead of racing to clear as many lines as possible, you have to fill the orders of those who come into your café and flashy combos mean less than a happy costumer. You still need to play quickly though, the customers won't wait for their food forever and once you run out of coffee to keep them happy it's all over. 

W - Rotate the piece CCW

A/D - Move the piece left/right

S - Quickly drop the piece

Esc - Close the game

Programming - Tim Steiner

Art - Ben Smock
